caption: Figure 2: The framework of SocialGPT, which follows the "perception with VFMs, reasoning with LLMs" paradigm. SocialGPT converts an image into a social story in the perception phase, and then employs LLMs to generate explainable answers in the reasoning phase with SocialPrompt.
description: The figure illustrates the SocialGPT framework, which uses vision foundation models (VFMs) for perception and large language models (LLMs) for reasoning to identify social relationships in images.
